name: Treasure Mountain
description:
Treasure Mountain is a 2.5D platformer where you play as a mage looking for treasures.
Leap into an adventure in purrsuit of gold.
EXPLORE mountain, discover all of their secrets!
DESTROY everyone in your path.
Gameplay:
- Combat in Treasure Mountain takes place entirely in real time.
- Traverse though 10 unique levels.
- Play like you want. Go for the highest score or explore at your own pace.

Fight for gold with other mages, slay the dragon and collect treasures of Treasure Mountain.
